definition: Anemarrhena asphodeloides/rhyzome of Anemarrhena (used in TCM)

sentences.english: Objective To study the receptor mechanism of anti-convulsant effect of Caoguo Zhimu Decoction (CZD).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討中藥草果知母湯抗癇作用的受體機制。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the chemical constituents of the rhizomes of Anemarrhena asphodeloides Bunge.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究知母根莖的化學成分。

sentences.english: Access to lots of documents, concluded the application of Lily and Anemarrhena soup.
sentences.chinese: 查閱大量文獻，總結百合知母湯的臨牀應用概況。

sentences.english: Fluorescence spectrum and absorption spectrum of RA were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了知母水溶液的紫外和熒光光譜。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of antioxidative activities of anemaran in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討知母多糖的體外抗氧化作用。

sentences.english: Until now, little was known about the sow's gut transit.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，知母豬腸過境。

sentences.english: Naturally the news of her mother's illness greatly disturbed Lady Sun.
sentences.chinese: 夫人聽知母病危急，如何不慌？
